prompts: Create an icy Pokemon that resembles a cute snow cone with a smiling face.
Imagine a Pokemon that looks like a floating ice cream dessert, with a chilly vibe.
Design a whimsical Pokemon with features inspired by frost and snow, perfect for winter battles.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of winter, with frosty colors and a friendly demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon that appears as if made from ice, featuring cheerful expressions and snowy textures.
Make a Pokemon that combines elements of ice and dessert, showcasing a playful personality.
Give me a Pokemon that floats gracefully, resembling a sweet treat made of ice and snow.
